overview:
Entrepreneur, Idea Man, Sr. Explorer in the Adventure we call Life.

High-Tech Executive & Executive Consultant Passions include Designing, Building Cloud & Data Center Infrastructures utilizing Cloud technologies and other cool & unique and innovative solutions to automate, protect, scale & distribute.

Hobbies: Skiing (Both kinds), Ducati Motorcycles, Custom Choppers, Muscle Cars & Exotic Super Cars, Collector of Books, Wine, Knives, Guns and Antiques. Passionate reader, writer traveler, explorer, dancer. Passionate about music in particular Jazz and Blues, Concerts, Festivals, Street Fairs & High-end audiophile Stereo Equipment, Tube Amps, Martin Logan Speaker Technology, etc..
